subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh’s Aaron Gray, who spent much of the game on the bench in foul trouble, sank two free throws in the final minute that helped the Panthers secure a victory in Friday night’s Big East semifinal.
snippet: Pittsburgh’s Aaron Gray, who spent much of the game on the bench in foul trouble, sank two free throws in the final minute that helped the Panthers secure a victory in Friday night’s Big East semifinal.
